sentences.en: Allow for some shrinkage in both length and width.
sentences.cn: 长、宽上都预留出一定的缩水量。

sentences.en: During the manufacturing process a plant usually experiences a degree of material shrinkage.
sentences.cn: 在生产过程中,工厂通常总要受到一点材料上的损失.

sentences.en: Freyssinet flat jacks may be required to compensate for distortions arising from creep and shrinkage.
sentences.cn: 弗涅新奈氏扁千斤顶可用以调整收缩与徐变产生的变形.

sentences.en: In addition , elutriation, growth, shrinkage and reaction act differently for the different - sized particles in the bed.
sentences.cn: 此外,扬析 、 长大 、 缩小和反应对床层中不同粒度的颗粒所引起的作用也不相同.

sentences.en: It is better to allow for shrinkage when buying cotton clothes.
sentences.cn: 买棉衣时最好要考虑到它们的缩水率.

sentences.en: On the other hand it is important to consider the shrinkage due to drying out.
sentences.cn: 另一方面,考虑由于干燥作用引起的收缩是重要的.

sentences.en: Pollution led to a shrinkage of grasslands.
sentences.cn: 污染导致草原面积缩小。

sentences.en: Shrinkage is the retail trade's euphemism for shoplifting.
sentences.cn: 商品损失(Shrinkage)是零售业对有人在店内行窃的委婉说辞.

sentences.en: Shrinkage level could be used as an index of agitation.
sentences.cn: 收缩程度可作为表示搅动的指数.

sentences.en: Shrinkage strains are mdependent of the stress conditions in the concrete.
sentences.cn: 混凝土的收缩是一种自发的变形,并不依靠作用在混凝土上的外力.

sentences.en: Shrinkage stress was found to increase linearly with cure temperature.
sentences.cn: 我们发现收缩应力随固化温度直线增加.

sentences.en: The holes of anchor bolts will be grouted with normal ( Portland, non - shrinkage ) cement mortar.
sentences.cn: 这些地脚螺孔将灌入普通 ( 波特兰, 无收缩 ) 水泥砂浆.

sentences.en: The swelling or shrinkage with changes in moisture content is known as movement.
sentences.cn: 木材随含水量变化发生膨胀或收缩,这种现象称为胀缩.

sentences.en: The technology conditions have effect on polyester shrinkage rate were discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了影响涤纶短纤维收缩率的工艺条件.

sentences.en: There has been much shrinkage of the clothes in the wash.
sentences.cn: 这些衣服洗后已缩了很多.

phrases.tran_cn: 燥收缩；干收缩；干水收缩
留矿采矿法；留矿回采；仓储采煤法

trans.tran_cn: 收缩，皱缩，缩水，跌价，抽缩
trans.tran_en: the act of shrinking, or the amount that something shrinks
